description:
Following http://anidb.net/ch109856 [William]`s plan, http://anidb.net/ch109855 [Albert] invites http://anidb.net/ch116686 [Irene] to a masquerade, where a game with the famed "Lord of Crime" as its theme is being played. Dressed as a man, Irene uses the game to contact Albert, pleading for her safety in return for the stolen papers.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: A Scandal in the British Empire Act 2
大英帝国の醜聞 第二幕
